ViewObject.Name: PwcOdmBreakDownHdrVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE1, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE10, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE11, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE12, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE13, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE14, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE15, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE2, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE3, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE4, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE5, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE6, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE7, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE8, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ATTRIBUTE9, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.BEAM_DIA_MM, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.BEAM_LENGTH, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.BEAM_WIDTH, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.BLEND, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.CONSTRACTION_1, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.CONTRACTION_2, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.CONTRACTION_3, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.CONTRACTION_4, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.CREATED_BY, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.CREATION_DATE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.DAY_REQ_TO_FINISH, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.DESIGN, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.DROPPER_THICKNESS_MM, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.END_DENT, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.FINISH_WIDTH, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.GD_NUMBER, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.GREIGE_WIDTH, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.GREY_EPI_TABLE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.GREY_EPI_WEAVING, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.GREY_FAB_WT, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.GREY_GSM, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.GREY_PPI_TABLE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.GREY_PPI_WEAVING, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.GREY_WIDTH_FOLDING, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.GREY_WIDTH_TABLE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.GREY_WIDTH_WEAVING, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.HEADER_ID, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.INSPECTION_FINISHED_DATE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ITEM_ID, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.LAST_DELIVERY_DATE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.LAST_UPDATED_BY, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.LOOM_PROD_PER_DAY, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.LOOM_RPM, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.LOOM_START_DATE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.LOOM_TYPE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.NUMBER_BEAM, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ORDER_QTY_MTR, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ORDER_QTY_YDS, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ORG_ID, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.PILE_YARN_BRAND, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.PILE_YARN_COUNT, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.PILE_YARN_ENDS_INCH, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.PLAN_LOOM, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.PROCESS_LOSS, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.REED_COUNT, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.REED_SPACE_INCH, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.REMAINING_YARN_REQ, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.REQ_FOLDING_PROD_DAY, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.REQ_SIZE_LENGTH, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.SALE_ORDER_NUMBER, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.SELVEDGE_ENDS, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.SELVEDGE_ENDS_BOTH_SIDES, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.SELVEDGE_ENDS_DENT, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.SELVEDGE_SIZE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.SIZE_TERRY, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.SPLITS, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.TOTAL_ENDS, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.TOTAL_PILE_YARN_ENDS, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.TOTAL_PILE_YARN_REQ, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.TOTAL_PROD_PER_DAY, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.TOTAL_WARP_REQ, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.TOTAL_WEAVABLE_LENGTH, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.TOTAL_WEFT_REQ, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.TOTAL_YARN_ALLOCATED, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.TOTAL_YARN_AVAILABLE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.TOTAL_YARN_REQ, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WARP_YARN_COUNT, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WARPING_FINISHING_DATE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WARPING_START_DATE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WEAVE_FINISHING_DATE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WEFT_COUNT, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WEFT_YARN_BLEND, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WEFT_YARN_BRAND, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WEFT_YARN_TYPE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WEIGHT_PILE_YARN, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WT_OF_WARP, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WT_OF_WEFT_YARN, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.YARN_BLEND, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.YARN_BRAND, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.YARN_LOT, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.YARN_PURCHASE_REQ, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.YARN_TYPE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.WEAVE, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.FEBRIC_PROCESS, PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO."LOOM_EFFICIENCY ", PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.C_W_PER, (SELECT MSI.SEGMENT1||'-'||MSI.SEGMENT2||'-'||MSI.SEGMENT3||'-'||MSI.SEGMENT4 FROM MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B MSI WHERE MSI.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ITEM_ID AND MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID = 353 AND ROWNUM = 1) ITEM_CODE, (SELECT MSI.DESCRIPTION FROM MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B MSI WHERE MSI.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ITEM_ID AND MSI.ORGANIZATION_ID = 353 AND ROWNUM = 1) ITEM_DESC, (SELECT INTERNAL_ADDRESS_LINE FROM hr_all_organization_units hou WHERE INTERNAL_ADDRESS_LINE IS NOT NULL AND ORGANIZATION_ID = PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO.ORG_ID) ORG_NAME FROM PWC_ODM_BREAK_DOWN_HDR PwcOdmBreakDownHdrEO
